body:
You could save the cast here by using
`half h8(8.0f);`

(I know I asked you to do the opposite in another PR, but I think in this case it's cleaner and it will save you from writing `static_cast<half>(8.0f)`.)

Same everywhere.
body_html:

Same everywhere.
